results.content: Loving the course so far. I've had experience making my own sites, and projects, but I like to catch up and learn from lectures, take notes and then create something based off of my learning. This course so far has been a great review as I remember all of the concepts that are necessary starting out with CSS, and learning a few new tricks along the way. Plus I like his teaching method and have another course of his I will complete soon.

results.content:
Great instructor! Great course!
I only wish the project bits had more explanations, like the footer part of project.4, telling us the effect of every element, but I guess than it'd take about 4-5 hrs per project. All in all, it was an awesome course, learned a lot and had fun doing.
